Suukie:

Suukie raised his sword..he was getting confused!... "well, Kluster, you are
about to go buster...on my friends that is, is that your biz?" Suukie was
confused by his own words even.... "if you are a Maximal, then you wouldn't
have doubted that they were good and all, you would have known they were
fighting for sport.....but you pulled your gun on them...despite not
detecting any Predacons......retort...." he said, desperatley trying to make
every word rhyme..... "you did not trust them, so i do not trust you....you
are a Predacon true and through!......" Suukie shoots a hunk out of the
mountain, catches it, and hurls it at Deathstorm....
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, April 17, 2000 11:03 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ::DeathStorm/Striker::
>
> DeathStorm growls quietly. Too quietly for Suukie to hear. This was
getting
> difficult.
>
> "For the second time: I am Kluster, a maximal fighter. I pulled my gun on
> your friends because I had seen honest Maximals like us go bad before. I
> couldn't take the risk. But I did not fire. A predacon would have fired."
>
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>
> Striker lands behind Liono. He had flown off after him when Liono's
meeting
> was finished.
>
> "I have a plan, Liono," He says, "We can take out Megatron while he is
> without a base or protection."
>
